Hi, nice to meet you.

Mechanial engineer. Web developer.
Designing products on and off the net.

I'm Dana, a junior at Yale University, originally from just outside of Boston. I'm majoring in Mechanical Engineering, but I also love web development, product design, and human interaction. Thus, my projects range from medical devices to museum exhibits to websites. It simply means I love building in many mediums and enjoy working in interdisciplinary areas. Outside of my work, I love traveling the world, eating delicious foods, and enjoying a good book with tea.
